org.mortbay.util
Class LogWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.Writer
        |
        +--org.mortbay.util.LogWriter
public class LogWriter
extends java.io.Writer

A Writer that writes to the Log when it is flushed. For best results wrap with a PrintWriter configured to flush on println() for example PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(new LogWriter(), true);

Author:
Kent Johnson
